thread.title: Great hotel in best Manhattan location
thread.title_full: Great hotel in best Manhattan location - Review of citizenM New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BertrandUK
title: Great hotel in best Manhattan location
text: This was our first stay at CitizenM Times Square, and we found the welcome attentive and friendly, the rooms really cozy and other amenities excellent, The 21st floor bar provides a great view of Manhattan, and the hotel is close to a number of Subway lines, making it easy to travel to all parts of NYC. Recommended.
